summary: Weather correction for almost all famous new land MOD so they dont have nasty fog or wierd lighting and some enhancement
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4]First of big thanks to you Vlad ( L3st4t ) for making such wonderful ENB preset ,i idolize uuuuuuu \ *0* /
ORIGIN ENB PRESET :[/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73864/?]LuciEN ENB[/url][/font]

[size=6][center][font=Georgia][color=#efefef][u]NEVER BEFORE[/u][/color][/font][/center][/size][center][color=#ff0000]
[/color][font=Georgia][size=4]Weather adaption for almost every popular new land mod so they dont get nasty fog or wrong lighting , total +80 weather.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LX04VKjl.png[/img]
[youtube]ZG4_4-uqQ3w[/youtube]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][u]LANDS LIST :[/u][/i][/size][/font][size=4]

Falskaar
Wyrmstooth
Summerset Isles
Gray Fox Cowl
Moonpath To Elsweyr ( Require my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81085?]Moonpath Weather Patch[/url] )
Molag Bals Inferno
Darkend
Vigilant
Beyond Reach
Forgotten City

[/size][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Georgia][size=4][size=4]Comment what popular new land MOD i missed in the POSTS section :D

[/size][/size][/font][/center][i][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][u]BASE PRESET INFO[/u] :[/size][/font][/i]

[size=2]-Almost no FPS lost.[/size]

-Weather system adapt for NLVA mod.

-More than 40 weather types.

-Every region has differents kind of weathers =.

-Have special Dawn and dusk time of day.

-All days have different light, so has nights.

[font=Comic Sans MS]
[size=5][i][u]ENHANCED[/u] :

[/i][/size][/font]-Realistic dungeon darkness.

-Add weather Lens effect , rain droplet on screen , frozen cam.

-Add realistic skin/objects wetness on rain weather.

-Add realistic sunglare and sun halo.

-Replace LuciEN DOF with a more gentle DOF for better gameplay. ( use original enbeffectprepass.fx from LuciEN ENB if u more of a screenarcher )

-Some small color / lighting / value adjustment.


[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][i][u]Installation Lucien NLVA ENB[/u] :[/i][/size][/font]

-Download and instal latest ENB binary  : [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]LINK[/url] ( All you need is d3d9.dll from the file )
-Download VividWeather and install it  : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]LINK[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]
[/url]-Deactivate Or Delete Vividweather.esp
-Download NLVA Weather and install it  :[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75346/?]LINK
[/url]-Download my files and put manually all files into your skyrim game folder ( overwrite if asked )

Enblocal.ini
-If u get stuttering turn off "EnableCompression=" ( true = on / false = off )
-Run VRamSizeDX9.exe , write down the number in the popup window into the ? symbol in "VideoMemorySizeMb=?"
[color=#ff0000]( WIN 10 and 8 will limit your VRAM to 4GB so the software will always report something around 4000 no matter how good your stuff r )[/color]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#ff0000]IF U ALREADY DONE ALL THESE BELOW SKIP IT IF U NOT SURE JUST DO IT THEN ( U WILL GET SERIOUS CRASH/GLITCHES IF U DONT DO IT )[/color][b]
[/b]
Install [url=https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429]Directx 9.0c[/url]

[size=2]Open SkyrimPrefs.ini in "C:\Users\<USERNAME>\Documents\My Games\Skyrim" and set these line or add them if you don't have it[/size]

[size=2]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/size]
[size=2]fShadowBiasScale=0.1600[/size]
[size=2]iBlurDeferredShadowMask=3 or 1 if u want the shadow is less blur but it will show more jagged lines[/size]
[size=2]bFXAAEnabled=0[/size]
[size=2]iMultiSample=0[/size]
[size=2]iMaxAnisotropy=1[/size]
[size=2]bTransparencyMultisampling=0[/size]


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]BONUS :[/size][/font]
[size=2][u][i]These will enable shadow on tree / land cast shadow on other land and on grass :
[/i][/u]
[/size]SkyrimPrefs.ini :
[size=2]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/size]
[size=2]bDrawLandShadows=1[/size]
[size=2]bShadowsOnGrass=1

[u][i]Save some fps :
[/i][/u]
[/size]Right Ctrl to open ENB menu or just open enbseries.ini

Turn off ( true = on , false = off )
depth of field ( focus blur effect )
ambient occlusion ( realistic ambient shadowing )

Recommend using shadow engine from SKGE , if u r using it , turn off detailed shadow from ENB also

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]To make it look exactly the same as the screenshot use ELFX + Hardcore

[/font][font=Comic Sans MS]NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ANY WEATHER MOD OUT THERE OR VANILLA BESIDE NLVA[/font][/size]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Credits:[/size][/font]

L3st4t - Base Preset
kingeric1992 - Weather Lens and sun glare
Miratheus - Ultimate Shader Addon
DOF - gp65cj04
CeeJay - SweetFX
Boris Vorontsov - ENB
author: Guilaster
